website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering for those who prefer little to no scent, and like the idea of the compact bottle – but it's not very practical for customers who are frequent users and don't want to spend a lot of money.
pros: An unrefined oil with no additives or fillers
Bottle includes a dropper that's easy to use
Oil doesn't feel overly heavy or too greasy on the skin
cons: Could get expensive if you use it frequently considering the small portion

customer_reviews.title: Morninga oil is one of the best kept skincare secrets on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Morninga oil is one of the best kept skin care secrets on the market! It’s better than any product I’ve ever used! It reduces fine lines and tightens skin!! I am absolutely in love with it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Bee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for hair and skin!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product primarily with jojoba oil and carrot seed oil as a face moisturizer and anti-aging serum! Use this face serum three times a week! Awesome results! I also use it when I mixed it with carrier oils for my hair. Awesome results as well! Very important to remember that only one or two drops are needed when applying to the skin or hair. Very strong oil in this little bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Roll Tide Minister

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have super sensitive skin wrong makeup and my face breaks in hives or get red itchy sections ... Lately even my safe makeup stated to cause me skin reactions ... Well after applying this oil I have no reactions to makeup !! Works really good ..I've even added drops to my makeup remover
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Arizpe

customer_reviews.title: Add to your DIY products.
customer_reviews.text: Wish the bottle was a little larger. Moringa oil can be added to DIY conditioner, and hair products. This oil is light and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Kerria

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL
customer_reviews.text: My wife was using coconut oil before she tried moringa oil.She said WOW,I'm sticking with this.She loves it.Will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: theodore

customer_reviews.title: Not greasy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: this seems to be working. I have some new hair regrownth in an area that was getting thin. Not greasy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Galbraith

customer_reviews.title: NOT ENOUGH OIL?
customer_reviews.text: Love of course, any oil...is good!! Ok ( this ) really does the job, on my skin and cuticles wonderful on the face and neck !! But... just not ENOUGH PRODUCT?? For the $10.00 dollar price-tag?!! The bottle is way too tiny. Using daily... after just (10) days it was gone! Finish... Gee. Will not buy again, way too expensive. Sorry AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Maz

customer_reviews.title: but perfect for making handmade beauty products
customer_reviews.text: I wish this product was sold in a bigger size, preferably in 1 fl oz, but perfect for making handmade beauty products. The oil is very lightweight and absorbs right into the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jori Kandra

customer_reviews.title: This oil is clear with no scent.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to be excited as my usual source for Moringa Oil has had shipping issues. So, I thought why not try Amazon. I am used to a nutty and golden oil while this one was clear through and through with no scent. Although it says it is unrefined. Not too convinced I received what is advertised and I am greatly dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie T

customer_reviews.title: Softens the skin
customer_reviews.text: I put this oil on my face like a moisturizer and it keeps my face Dewey not oily. It sinks down into your skin and stays there. All day long I kept touching my face and it felt and smooth and moist. My neighbors from Jamaica bring back the leaves of this plant and put it in their smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: dale hensley

customer_reviews.title: Priced too high
customer_reviews.text: Mother Nature Organics Moringa oil (4 ounces) is a much better deal for people wanting to use this really fabulous oil.
customer_reviews.author: CDB

customer_reviews.title: This product is a hidden gem on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to use, this oil is a hidden gem in the market! Great product. Definitely recommend it. It works great on my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Manouche DeLeau

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking into hair growth products or serums for my natural hair, the serums I was considering buying we're very expensive, and I thought to myself I have a family history of stylists in my family and I myself have held a license for over 20 years. So I decided to make a serum for myself and my family's hair for growth, and this was one of the products I used. Very good product for hair growth and health. Love it will reorder when I am out..
customer_reviews.author: star

customer_reviews.title: Dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t help my dry scalp or eczema. The day after I put the oil on my scalp, I think the itching got worse. However , it helped my cracked dry lips. Due the constant wearing of face masks, my lips suffered the most since the skin is so thin. I wouldn’t recommend putting this on acne prone or combination skin.
customer_reviews.author: Paulina C.

customer_reviews.title: Worked Fast !
customer_reviews.text: Such a great natural product for Pimples , Scars , Acne on my 19 year old . Showed results on 3rd Day applying Twice Daily. We love this product !!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia McGrail

customer_reviews.title: You'll love it!
customer_reviews.text: This oil is amazing and will buy more! It's made my skin smooth in a week!
customer_reviews.author: Laramie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Honest 🌷 Review
customer_reviews.text: I love this Mornings oil. It's light and feels very soothing to my dry skin. Absorbed very easily into the skin. Pleasant scent very earthy. I recommend it!👍
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Helped me
customer_reviews.text: After taking this, I felt better and helped me to sleep
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Very good Works well on insect bites Moisturizer Not much in. Ottle
customer_reviews.author: Jordan-Jackson

customer_reviews.title: No scent, no color! What is this?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what this is, but its not moringa oil. It has no color and absolutely no scent. I ordered a different brand, and its excellent.
customer_reviews.author: T Bone

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase, works great.
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped most Irias my skin and helped against some small discoloration that I had as well. Will buy again and recommend it for anyone to use.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Soria Jr

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: Just used it for the first time so we will see
customer_reviews.author: Caron

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It really helped me and I truly believe could be good for you if your looking to buy.
customer_reviews.author: jhikell jackson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great oil found a lot of different applications for it love this stuff
customer_reviews.author: ACE

customer_reviews.title: I am not disappointed. It does not irritate my skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bottle; left it open because of my own stupidity, and it spilled all over the bathroom counter. I ordered a second bottle; I am not disappointed. It does not irritate my skin, which is rare because I tend to suffer from eczema. So far, I like it, and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STUFF
customer_reviews.text: I HAD SEVERAL SKIN CANCER SPOTS & AFTER RUBBING MORINGA OIL ON THEM FOR 2 WEEKS THEY ARE ALMOST GONE . GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: J.E.F.

customer_reviews.title: Magic!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff for my skin and hair. I’ve been recovering from some severe health issues which had affected my skin and hair tremendously. This moringa oil does ten times what any $90+ products do. I am so in love with this stuff. I’ve even used in for my nine year old duaghter’s skin, which often becomes irritated from chlorine as she’s a swimmer. Works like a charm in one application.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful oil. I have a really dry skin in ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful oil. I have a really dry skin in the winter months and this oil helps a lot. I've just used it for few days and already see a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil!
customer_reviews.text: This was my second bottle of this moringa oil. I love the difference it has made on my skin and hair. Very moisturizing for both. Wouldn't want to be without it.
customer_reviews.author: Simone

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Definitely see a difference in my nails
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Definitely see a difference in my nails. They're healthier, they're growing fast, and they're harder. I would definitely recommend this if you have brittle nails
customer_reviews.author: Venisa karajic

customer_reviews.title: Works like an oil
customer_reviews.text: Product is ok. I use it in my hair to keep frizzy hair down. The lid was cracked when it arrived do I have to watch it does not leak.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I used once and the whole bottle is done. Too much money for such a small amount
customer_reviews.author: Reba

product_meta.title: MORINGA OIL - Moringa oleifera WILD GROWTH Himalayan. 100% Pure/Natural/Undiluted/Virgin/Unrefined. 0.5 Fl.oz.- 15 ml. For Skin, Hair, Lip and Nail Care.
product_meta.description:
Moringa Oil spreads nicely, makes the skin soft, smooth and supple. Moringa Oil is one of the best natural skin moisturizers because of its lightness—it moisturizes dry skin without leaving it greasy. Vitamins A and C, unsaturated fatty acids and palmitoleic, oleic and linoleic acids provide its great moisturizing and nourishing qualities. 

This oil is a great skin purifier that makes your skin glow naturally. 

A healthy natural way to help reduce dry skin inflammation, redness and itchiness, it is also an ideal moisturizer for those with psoriasis, eczema, and easily irritated skin. 

Moringa Oil is also a good way to tighten the skin and reduce the appearance of wrinkles, puffiness and under the eye shadows and darkness. 

Suitable for all skin types, it is a great aromatherapy carrier oil, massage oil or after bath oil.

Directions:

DILUTE WELL BEFORE USE IF YOU NOT BE ABLE TO HANDLE THE SMELL OF AN UNREFINED OILS. 

FOR FACE & BODY: A few drops are sufficient to apply on the whole face. It is usually applied at night as a moisturizing agent. It is non-greasy and non-oily and absorbs into the skin very easily and does not leave an oily feel. Or just mix a few drops with your favorite cream. it is a great massage oil or after bath oil. 

FOR HAIR: Add 2-3 drops to your own favorite shampoo or conditioner. It gives the hair freshness, brilliance and luster. 

FOR FACE & BODY & HAIR: Just mix a few drops with your favorite cream, lotion, makeup remover, shower & bath gel, shampoos, face mask, sunscreen products and various lip balms. You will love this oil.
feature_bullets: MORINGA OIL is rich in gamma linoleic acid, or GLA, which comes from essential fatty acid and vitamins A, B, B1, B2, B3, C, D, E, K & P, ideal light moisturizer for everyday use.

MORINGA OIL is PURE/ UNDILUTED / VIRGIN / UNREFINED with no chemicals or synthetic solvents. No fillers, additives or artificial fragrances added. Non toxic, does not clog the pores. Absorbs quickly, leaving a light, non-greasy feeling. Not tested on Animals, DOES NOT CONTAIN ANY PRESERVATIVES. MORINGA OIL is acquired from first presses of unshelled Moringa seeds, harvested from wild-growing plantations in Himalaya.
MORINGA OIL is very beneficial for plumping and firming the skin. Suitable for all skin types, it is a great aromatherapy carrier oil, massage oil or after bath oil.

Used topically for WRINKLES, SCARS, STRETCH MARKS, RASHES, BURNS, ACNE SCARS, DRY SKIN, CRACKED SKIN, ECZEMA, PSORIASIS, CELLULITE, ACNE AND OTHER SKIN CONDITIONS... MORINGA OIL is highly recommended for DRY, CHAPPED LIPS and ANTI CELLULITE.
MORINGA OIL is highly recommended for DRY, BRITTLE AND DAMAGED HAIR to encourage healthy hair growth, repair split ends and increased vitality.
